text: Wa 'Idha Kunta Fihim Fa'aqamta Lahumu As-Salaata Faltaqum Ta'ifatun Minhum Ma`aka Wa Lia'khudhu 'Aslihatahum Fa'idha Sajadu Falyakunu Min Wara'ikum Wa Lta'ti Ta'ifatun 'Ukhra Lam Yusallu Falyusallu Ma`aka Wa Lia'khudhu Hidhrahum Wa 'Aslihatahum Wadda Al-Ladhina Kafaru Law Taghfuluna `An 'Aslihatikum Wa 'Amti`atikum Fayamiluna `Alaykum Maylatan Wahidatan Wa La Junaha `Alaykum 'In Kana Bikum 'Adhaan Min Matarin 'Aw Kuntum Marđa 'An Tađa`u 'Aslihatakum Wa Khudhu Hidhrakum 'Inna Allaha 'A`adda Lilkafirina `Adhabaan Muhinaan
